properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_TITLE , ENR_DATE , ANS_CONTENT FROM QNA WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY ENR_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM QNA WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME MEM_NAME, ENR_DATE, ANS_CONTENT FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON ( Q.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO ) ORDER BY ENR_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME MEM_NAME, QNA_CONTENT, ENR_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.MEM_NO=M.MEM_NO) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT IMG_NO, IMG_PATH, POST_CATEGORY, POST_NO FROM IMAGE WHERE POST_CATEGORY = 1 AND POST_NO = ?
SELECT M.MEM_NAME ANS_ADMIN, ANS_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ANS_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ANS_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.MEM_ADMIN=M.MEM_NO) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET ANS_CONTENT = ?, MEM_ADMIN = ?, ANS_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET ANS_CONTENT = NULL, MEM_ADMIN = NULL, ANS_DATE = NULL WHERE QNA_NO = ?
